name: Federation of United Planets
startIntroPart2: The United Federation of Planets is an alliance of species dedicated to space exploration.  It was founded by Vulcans, Humans, Andorians, and Tellarites in 2161. The Federation has since expanded to include many other members and continues to grow in size, influence, and importance throughout the galaxy.
declaringWar: Don't leave us any Logical solution
attacked: The Federation is committed to defending its members from all attackers
defeated: Change is the essential process of all existence, Live Long and Prosper
introduction: We come in peace! Live Long and Prosper
afterPeace: Let's hope this peace lasts a long time, Live Long and Prosper
tradeRequest: We think you may be interested in this trade offer.
